name: CollaborateMD
overview:
One of the Industry’s First Internet Medical Billing Software Solutions

Making Health Information Technology (HIT) adoption easier for the small physician practices with Practice Management (PM) and Electronic Health Record (EHR). To help you optimize administrative and clinical workflows, our integrated solution makes complex tasks simpler and more efficient. Our PM solution helps streamline the medical claims process to help you get paid faster and reduce costs.
